item.title: Resume
item.description: WORKED WITH DDD, TDD, SOLID, CQRS, .NET Core, Clean Architecture, Event Sourcing, Akka.NET, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, REST API, Microservices, Serverless Functions, AMQP, SQL, NoSQL, Git, Azure, GCP, Kanban, Scrum. WORK EXPERIENCE Backend Developer @ Record Union ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ª (06/2018 - Present) Developed a distributed application with actors, CQRS and Event Sourcing using .NET Core 2 and Akka.NET as primary stack, hosted on GKE and using Kubernetes. Collaborated with CI/CD pipeline configuration and optimisation.

item.title: About
item.description: Hey! Nice to see you around here. I am Pablo Morelli ğŸ§”ğŸ» and I work as a backend developer at Record Union. Currently living in Stockholm ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ª but was born and lived most of my life in Buenos Aires ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡·. Coding since 2010, and with most of my experience on .NET (and .NET Core) I am looking towards getting more knowledgeable regarding other stacks. My aim here is to write (mostly) about tech problems and possible solutions to them.
